name: RetroCat
description: RetroCat is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its retro console box, classic buttons, cat arms and legs, classic screen, and stylish shades add-on, RetroCat combines the nostalgia of vintage gaming with the sleekness of modern design. This robot brings a touch of charm and charisma to the WebtrES club, mesmerizing others with its unique appearance and functionality.
